## Overview

This document tests `logolink` under the different experiments set in the *Voting Sensitivity Analysis* model, included in NetLogo along with the [IABM Textbook](https://mitpress.mit.edu/9780262731898/an-introduction-to-agent-based-modeling/) library.

## Set the Environment

### Load Packages

```{r}
library(logolink)
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

### Set Model Path

```{r}
model_path <-
  find_netlogo_home() |>
  file.path(
    "models",
    "IABM Textbook",
    "chapter 7",
    "Voting Sensitivity Analysis.nlogox"
  )
```

## Sensitivity Experiment

```{r}
experiment <- "sensitivity-experiment"
```

```{r}
results <-
  model_path |>
  run_experiment(
    experiment = experiment
  )
```

```{r}
results |> glimpse()
```
